Description: Head-rest carved from wood with conical base, flat trapezoid shaped central support, concave top with carved bow shaped supports on the underside running from the centre to the outer edges.The base, central support and top edges are carved with linea and interlace designs.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Isma'il Pasha, Viceroy of Egypt
Acquisition notes: Af,+.989 to 1003.a were presented to the BM by the Khedive of Egypt (Isma'il Pasha) on 1 December 1878, and had all been previously shown in the Paris Exhibition of 1878.
